ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup, undiluted
instructions: In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Add basil, paprika and garlic powder.
Stir in soup and milk until well blended.
Cook over medium heat for 6 minutes or until heated through.
title: Flavorful Tomato Soup
steps: In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. Add basil, paprika and garlic powder. Stir in soup and milk until well blended. Cook over medium heat for 6 minutes or until heated through.
